ojc.bain.neuron.rate

Class ClampedLinearNeuronCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amd.aparapi.Kernel
      • ojc.bain.base.ComponentCollection
        • ojc.bain.base.ConfigurableComponentCollection<C>
          • ojc.bain.base.NeuronCollection<C>
            • ojc.bain.neuron.rate.NeuronCollectionWithBias
              • ojc.bain.neuron.rate.ClampedLinearNeuronCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ComponentConfigurationListener

    public class ClampedLinearNeuronCollection
extends NeuronCollectionWithBias
    Implements neurons that pass through received input, but chop-off values below 0 or above 1.
    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Description copied from class: NeuronCollection
        Implements the basic infrastructure for processing a neuron by resetting the value of NeuronCollection.inputs and setting the value for NeuronCollection.spikings. Sub-classes must override this method and call the super-method after they have made use of the value in NeuronCollection.inputs to generate a value for ComponentCollection.outputs. Alternatively, if NeuronCollection.inputs should be reset to something other than 0 or a neuron spike is represented by something other than a value greater than 0 in ComponentCollection.outputs, then this super-method need not be called and the overriding method should instead reset the values for NeuronCollection.inputs AND set the value for NeuronCollection.spikings.
        Overrides:
        run in class NeuronCollection

      • getConfigSingleton

        public ComponentConfiguration getConfigSingleton()
        Description copied from class: ConfigurableComponentCollection
        Get a reference to the sub-class specific ComponentConfiguration object for this ConfigurableComponentCollection.

      • ensureStateVariablesAreFresh

        public void ensureStateVariablesAreFresh()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Ensure the state variable values have been fetched from the remote execution hardware (eg GPU) if necessary. See ComponentCollection.stateVariablesStale.
        Specified by:
        ensureStateVariablesAreFresh in class ComponentCollection

        public ComponentCollection createCollection(int size)
